explanation: [0-0] A man in a gray shirt stands in front of a large LED screen, raising his right hand forward, his eyes looking straight ahead. The screen displays a scene of a beach under a blue sky, along with icons of various social media software. There is a blue stool next to the LED screen, behind which are some steel brackets. Workers are working on the right side. The floor is gray with yellow and black tape on it. In the lower-left corner, there is a blue caption that reads "EAGERAED" and a black caption that reads "亿格创". There is a yellow line above and below the caption.

[0-6] The man in gray swings his right hand, then the camera moves forward. He pats the Google icon on the LED screen with his right hand, picks up a black tool, puts it on the Google icon, presses the screen with his left hand, sucks the Google icon down with his right hand, turns it around, and then puts it back on. The caption in the lower-left corner keeps moving to the upper right.
